original_text: “‘Because you have said, “These two nations and countries will be ours and we will take possession of them,” even though I the Lord was there,
korean_text: 네가 말하기를 이 두 민족과 두 땅은 다 내 것이며 내 기업이 되리라 하였도다 그러나 여호와께서 거기에 계셨느니라

sentences.original_text: and we will take possession of them
even though I the Lord was there
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 나 주께서 그곳에 계셨음에도 불구하고
